title: Richard Simms
alertText: An alert is messaging that tells the user some information. Alerts can be error, warning, success, or info messages
quoteText: “A block quotation (also known as a long quotation or extract) is a quotation in a written document, that is set off from the main text as a paragraph, or block of text, and typically distinguished visually using indentation and a different typeface or smaller size quotation.”

about.name: About Richard Simms
about.intro: Now a London designer at SapientNitro, I am originally from North Yorkshire and moved to the capital in 2004. Much of my early work focused on digital art and I admired artist like Dylan Cole. By pushing the boundaries of digital experience I hope to make my world a slightly better place. To read about my past cv please check out my LinkedIn profile here

headline.short: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
